proc index(value: int; capacity: int): int {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
Given a head or tail value in the range 0..<2*capacity, determine its actual index in storage.   Source Edit 
proc incOrReset(original: int; amount: int; capacity: int): int {...}{.inline, raises: [],
    tags: [].}
Given an original head or tail value and an amount to increment, either increment original by amount, or reset from zero if original + amount >= 2 * capacity.   Source Edit
